verses.verse: Then <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"Therefore do my <S%H5587>thoughts<s%> give <S%H7725>answer<s%> to <S%H2363>me,<s%> even by reason of my haste that is in me.
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4148>reproof<s%> which puts me to <S%H3639>shame.<s%> The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of my <S%H998>understanding<s%> answers <S%H6030>me.<s%>
<S%H3045>Don't<s%> you know this from <S%H5703>old<s%> <S%H120>time,<s%> since man was <S%H7760>placed<s%> on <S%H776>earth,<s%>
that the <S%H7445>triumphing<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7138>short,<s%> the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of the <S%H2611>godless<s%> but for a <S%H7281>moment?<s%>
Though his <S%H7863>height<s%> mount <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5060>reach<s%> to the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%>
yet he shall <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H5331>forever<s%> like his own <S%H1561>dung.<s%> Those who have <S%H7200>seen<s%> him shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H335><s%> 'Where is he?'
He shall fly <S%H5774>away<s%> as a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and shall not be <S%H4672>found.<s%> <S%H5074>Yes,<s%> he shall be chased away like a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eye<s%> which <S%H7805>saw<s%> him shall see him no <S%H3254>more,<s%> neither shall his <S%H4725>place<s%> any more see <S%H3254>him.<s%>
His <S%H1121>children<s%> shall seek the <S%H7521>favor<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor.<s%> His <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall give <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H202>wealth.<s%>
His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth,<s%> but youth shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> with him in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
"Though <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H4985>sweet<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> though he <S%H3582>hide<s%> it under his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%>
though he <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H5800>it,<s%> and will not let it go, but keep it <S%H4513>still<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> his <S%H2441>mouth;<s%>
yet his <S%H3899>food<s%> in his <S%H4578>bowels<s%> is <S%H2015>turned.<s%> It is <S%H6620>cobra<s%> <S%H4846>venom<s%> within <S%H7130>him.<s%>
He has swallowed <S%H1104>down<s%> <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and he shall vomit them up <S%H6958>again.<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> will cast them <S%H3423>out<s%> of his <S%H990>belly.<s%>
He shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H6620>cobra<s%> <S%H7219>venom.<s%> The <S%H660>viper<s%>'s <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall kill <S%H2026>him.<s%>
He shall not <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H6390>rivers,<s%> the <S%H5104>flowing<s%> <S%H6390>streams<s%> of <S%H1706>honey<s%> and <S%H2529>butter.<s%>

That for which he <S%H3022>labored<s%> he shall <S%H7725>restore,<s%> and shall not swallow it <S%H1104>down.<s%> According to the <S%H2428>substance<s%> that he has <S%H8545>gotten,<s%> he shall not <S%H5965>rejoice.<s%>
For he has <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> and <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1800>poor.<s%> He has violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%> a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he shall not build it <S%H1129>up.<s%>
"Because he <S%H3045>knew<s%> no <S%H7961>quietness<s%> within <S%H990>him,<s%> he shall not <S%H4422>save<s%> anything of that in which he <S%H2530>delights.<s%>
There was <S%H400>nothing<s%> <S%H8300>left<s%> that he <S%H2898>didn't<s%> devour, therefore his prosperity shall not <S%H2342>endure.<s%>
In the <S%H4390>fullness<s%> of his <S%H5607>sufficiency,<s%> <S%H3334>distress<s%> shall overtake <S%H3027>him.<s%> The hand of everyone who is in <S%H6001>misery<s%> shall come on <S%H935>him.<s%>

When he is about to <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H990>belly,<s%> God will <S%H7971>cast<s%> the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath<s%> on <S%H4305>him.<s%> It will rain on him while he is <S%H3894>eating.<s%>
He shall <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5402>weapon.<s%> The <S%H5154>bronze<s%> <S%H7198>arrow<s%> shall strike him <S%H2498>through.<s%>

He <S%H8025>draws<s%> it <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and it comes out of his <S%H1465>body.<s%> <S%H1300>Yes,<s%> the glittering point comes <S%H1980>out<s%> of his <S%H4846>liver.<s%> Terrors are on <S%H367>him.<s%>

All <S%H2822>darkness<s%> is <S%H2934>laid<s%> up for his <S%H6845>treasures.<s%> An <S%H5301>unfanned<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3415>him.<s%> It shall consume that which is <S%H8300>left<s%> in his <S%H168>tent.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H1540>reveal<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> shall rise up against <S%H6965>him.<s%>
The <S%H2981>increase<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1540>depart.<s%> They shall rush <S%H5064>away<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath.<s%>
This is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H561>appointed<s%> to him by <S%H410>God.<s%>"
